name: hi_score
description: Are you ready to get off the framework-of-the-month treadmill and take control of your SPA? Hi_Score is here to help with an architecture guide, starter files, and best-in-class libraries.

scripts.covera: node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/nodeunit test/nu_xhi.util.js; cat coverage/lcov.info | node_modules/.bin/coveralls

author: Michael S. Mikowski <mike.mikowski@gmail.com>
